tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patent_infringement_cases (
    case_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patent_number VARCHAR(50),
    plaintiff_name VARCHAR(100),
    defendant_name VARCHAR(100),
    case_status VARCHAR(50),
    resolution_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patent_infringement_cases (
    case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patent_number VARCHAR(20),
    plaintiff_name VARCHAR(50),
    defendant_name VARCHAR(50),
    case_status VARCHAR(20),
    resolution_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE case_resolutions (
    resolution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_id INT REFERENCES patent_infringement_cases (case_id),
    resolution_type VARCHAR(50),
    resolution_description TEXT,
    resolution_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patent_infringement_cases (
    case_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patent_number VARCHAR(50),
    plaintiff VARCHAR(100),
    defendant VARCHAR(100),
    filing_date DATE,
    resolution_status VARCHAR(50),
    resolution_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE pharmaceutical_companies (
    company_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(100),
    headquarters_location VARCHAR(150),
    ceo_name VARCHAR(100),
    founding_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE legal_representatives (
    representative_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    representative_name VARCHAR(100),
    law_firm VARCHAR(150),
    contact_email VARCHAR(100),
    contact_phone VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE patent_cases (
   case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   patent_number VARCHAR(255),
   plaintiff VARCHAR(255),
   defendant VARCHAR(255),
   case_status VARCHAR(50),
   resolution_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE case_evidence (
   evidence_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   case_id_fk INT,
   evidence_type VARCHAR(50),
   description TEXT,
   FOREIGN KEY (case_id_fk) REFERENCES patent_cases(case_id)
);

CREATE TABLE case_expenses (
   expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   case_id_fk INT,
   expense_type VARCHAR(50),
   amount DECIMAL,
   expense_date DATE,
   FOREIGN KEY (case_id_fk) REFERENCES patent_cases(case_id)
);

CREATE TABLE case_outcomes (
   outcome_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   case_id_fk INT,
   outcome VARCHAR(255),
   settlement_amount DECIMAL,
   resolution_date DATE,
   FOREIGN KEY (case_id_fk) REFERENCES patent_cases(case_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patent_cases (
  case_id INT NOT NULL,
  patent_number VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  plaintiff VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  defendant VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  filing_date DATE NOT NULL,
  resolution_date DATE,
  PRIMARY KEY (case_id)
)

CREATE TABLE patent_evidence (
  evidence_id INT NOT NULL,
  case_id INT NOT NULL,
  evidence_description TEXT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (evidence_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES patent_cases(case_id)
)

CREATE TABLE resolutions (
  resolution_id INT NOT NULL,
  case_id INT NOT NULL,
  resolution_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  resolution_details TEXT,
  resolution_date DATE NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (resolution_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES patent_cases(case_id)
)

CREATE TABLE lawyers (
  lawyer_id INT NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  specialized_area VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (lawyer_id)
)

CREATE TABLE law_firms (
  firm_id INT NOT NULL,
  firm_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  primary_contact VARCHAR(255),
  PRIMARY KEY (firm_id)
)
